item.title: Creating bell.plus
item.description: You’d think a countdown timer to the end of class would be an easy one-day project. I thought so too, but it ended up dominating my free time during my senior year of high school. It began as many good projects do – I was feeling a bit lazy. My high school’s schedule changed frequently depending on the day of the week, and I rarely knew exactly when the bell was supposed to ring.
